name: Block Jumper (itch)
description:
« BLOCK JUMPER » is a platformer game with pixel art graphism. Your mission as a player: Escape a room by jumping on the falling blocks to finally land safely on the end platform.
But! You must avoid being crushed by a block, or falling into the void, or even, ending up imprisoned between 4 walls. (It would be too bad..)

Will you be able to join the safe platform? ... Or will you perish?
~
This is our participation to the 42nd edition of « LUDUM DARE ». We made this game in 72h, even if we had some misadventures during our journey.
But here it is! Fresh for you to give it a try!

Controls:
- Keyboard (Enter, Arrow, ZQSD)

- Gamepad (Joystick, A)

You can respawn with Y (GamePad) or R (KeyBoard)

Greetings,
- Akadream and Anastasia Th.S.
